description: Embark on an epic action-adventure as you slash, dash, and combo your way through a sprawling land scarred by conflict. Explore and uncover hidden secrets. Customize your build to triumph in spectacular boss fights. Experience a tale of mystery, magic, and mayhem in TEVI, a bullet hell metroidvania!
name: TEVI
intro: Our fates entwine, embarking on a journey to find the gears that can change the world.
